name: Zelenskyy's Wrath
description:
Chapter 1 of Zelenskyy's Wrath 

Play as the President of Ukraine, Voldymyr Zelenskyy, and protect your homeland from the Russian invaders. 

* Play with 3 different weapons from the Ukrainian battlefield (Glock17, M4-WAC-47 and the mighty Javelin missile launcher)

* Meet NPCs based on current real life events

* Take the battle to the Russians and Chechens 

* Make it through Bykivnia Forest back to Kyiv unscathed

Game is free for download on Windows PC.

Any donation will be transferred to Come Back Alive, providing support to the Ukrainian Armed Forces.

Credits:

Created by Nicolas Helssen

Coding Tutorials followed: Shaun Spalding  & 1upIndie

Parallax Background by Saukgp

TileSets & Sprites from Craftpix

Epic Music by Zakhar Valaha from Kalush, Ukraine

--

Chapter 2 in development pending interest from community.
